attributes.action: Halt proposed reforms to Personal independence payments (PIP)
attributes.additional_details: Because it's an attack on the countries most vulnerable, pip doesn't give people a lavish lifestyle. It allows them to survive. Altering the structure would be detrimental to the population
attributes.background: Stop attacking the most vulnerable people with reforms that will affect there ability to survive.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547
